name: Surface to Air Prototype
description:
This Game is my first Game. It is Inspired by the Die Hard 4 Helicopter meets car scene, and is made for #MovieGameJam (https://itch.io/jam/moviegamejam) It has been a great learning experience, and if there is enough interest I'll continue updating it after the voting period for the jam is complete. Possibly even make a more sound game. Although the concept feels more like a side mission for a game like Saints Row.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2/10/18: At this time the game is currently unfinished and very buggy. Your vehicle can fly indefinitely if you hit the angles right and it has no sound what so ever. I uploaded it in this state because I feel I will run out of time to finish it before the submission deadline, and my brain is telling me I need 3 days minimum away from this project. I have included the complete project file for those interested in the ins and outs, the one simply named "Surface to Air.zip"
